items.key: (@@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)) and status = '1'
items.check: @@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)

command.text: declare @y1 int, @y2 int select @y1 = year(ngay_gh1), @y2 = year(ngay_gh2) from dmstt select 'this._y1=' + rtrim(@y1) + ';this._y2=' + rtrim(@y2) + ';active$Filter$SalaryComputingPeriod(this);' as message return

declare @c varchar(13) select @c = (select bp_ref from hrbp where ma_bp = @ma_bp) select @c = isnull(@c, '') select '' as field, '' as message, 'set$ExternalKeyFilter(this,''' + @c + ''');' as script return
